install.name: RokMediaScroller
install.author: RocketTheme
install.description:
RokMediaScroller Module

MediaScroller module created for rt_mediamogul template

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: moduleid
param.label: ID of module
param.description: A unique ID is needed for every module on a page

param.name: feed_cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: maxcount
param.label: Count
param.description: The number of items to display

param.name: feedurl
param.label: Feed URL
param.description: The URL of the Media RSS Feed

param.name: jslib
param.label: Include rokmediascroller.js
param.description: Select whether to include the RokMediaScroller JS lib as part of this module, Select No if another RokMediaScroller module is published

param.name: duration
param.label: Transition Duration
param.description: Duration in ms of cross-blend transition

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
